article_title: Columbus Regional exploring possibility of affiliation or partnership
article_text:
Move comes as nonprofit hospital company is on the verge of making an operating surplus for the first time in four years

Timing is right for discussions, Chairman Warren Steele says

CEO Scott Hill says the situation is different from what happened at St. Francis

article_metadata.news-keywords: Columbus Regional Health, St. Francis, partnership, Scott Hill, health care costs, healthcare costs, Affordable Care Act, Obama Care
article_metadata.description: Columbus Regional Health System’s Board of Directors has authorized the organization to explore the possibility of entering into a “strategic affiliation or partnership with another health-care organization,” President and Chief Executive Officer Scott Hill confirmed on Thursday.
